content: floral star doily andrea moberly c 2008 this pattern may be used for personal/gift use only if interested in selling this item please contact the designer for permission knitsandknots@gmail com materials small amount size 10 crochet cotton size 7 hook gauge completed row 1&2 = 1 3/4 diameter finished size = 4 1/4 diameter abbreviations yo - yarn over chain - chain sl - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet treble_crochet - treble_crochet wrap yarn around hook 2 times insert into indicated stitch yo pull loop through stitch *yo draw through 2 loops repeat from * until one loop remains on hook dtr - double treble_crochet wrap yarn around hook 3 times insert into indicated stitch yo pull loop through stitch *yo draw through 2 loops repeat from * until one loop remains on hook ttr - triple treble_crochet wrap yarn around hook 4 times insert into indicated stitch yo pull loop through stitch *yo draw through 2 loops repeat from * until one loop remains on hook round - round chain space - chain space loop or space formed by a chain starting ring chain 5 join with sl to starting chain to form a ring round 1 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet work 15 double_crochet in ring sl to top of starting chain 3 16 double_crochet round 2 *chain 6 sl in next double_crochet repeat from * 14 more times chain 3 work double_crochet in same st as first chain 6 loop 16 chain spaces round 3 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet double_crochet in same chain space 2 double_crochet in next chain space chain 2 *2 double_crochet in next chain space 2 double_crochet in next chain space ch2 repeat from * around joining with a sl to top of starting chain 3 to join 8 chain 2 space round 4 sl across to the next chain 2 space chain 3 2 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in same chain space a 6 double_crochet shell worked *chain 2 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next chain space repeat from * around chain 1 double_crochet in top of starting chain 3 to join 8 - 6 double_crochet shells round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in same chain space *chain 10 skip next 6 double_crochet shell single_crochet in next chain 2 space between shells repeat from * around to last chain space chain 4 ttr in starting single_crochet to join 8 - chain 10 spaces round 6 chain 1 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet in same chain space * 2 treble_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 treble_crochet in next chain space repeat from * around ending with 2 treble_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in starting chain space sl to starting single_crochet to join
